Author: Blackcatz1911
Name: Currency Spender
Punchline: Figure out what to do with all the ingame currency.
Description:
'What the heck do I do with that?' will be a question for the past. Get notifications and/or toasts, when your ingame currencies exceed a certain thresshold. Get the current prices from universalis and see what you can do with those Poetics.
/currency
